description: Attack the enemy.
name: Attack
note:
<setup action>

display action

if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'

camera focus: target
zoom: 150%, 20
 camera offset: right, 50

else

camera focus: user
zoom: 250%, 20
wait: 20
camera focus: target
zoom: 150%, 20
 camera offset: right, 50

end

immortal: targets, true
</setup action>

<target action>

if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
 move user: targets, front, 20
else
 perform start
end

wait for movement
motion attack: user
wait:10
attack animation: target
wait for animation

action effect
wait for animation
wait for movement
wait: 5

</target action>

wait for movement

action common event

</finish action>

description: (ENEMY VARIANT!) - Impostor
name: Bitch Slap
note:
<setup action>

display action

if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'

camera focus: target
zoom: 150%, 20
 camera offset: right, 50

else

camera focus: user
zoom: 250%, 20
wait: 20
camera focus: target
zoom: 150%, 20
 camera offset: right, 50

end

immortal: targets, true
</setup action>

<target action>

if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
 move user: targets, front, 20
else
 perform start
end

wait for movement
motion attack: user
wait:10
attack animation: target
wait for animation

action effect
wait for animation
wait for movement
wait: 5

</target action>
